author: cindybA7627DU
title: Great hotel right in Times Square
text: We were extremely satisfied with the DoubleTree in Times Square. This was my first trip to NYC and the hotel met and exceeded my expectations. Location was great - we were within walking distance of Broadway Shows, Rockefeller Center, Macy's, Empire State Building, and more. The price was great in comparison to other hotels we looked into for this trip. The staff members we interacted with were friendly and helpful.
